quotes: wife Nobuko in 1970. Nobuko, born in Okayama Prefecture, entered a relationship with the Tokyo-dwelling Kan after entering Tsuda College.
Gentarō is a social activist and ran unsuccessfully for the House of Representatives in 2003 and 2005.
Gentarō is a social activist and ran unsuccessfully for the House of Representatives in 2003 and 2005.
He later served as political secretary to his father and was elected to the Musashino City Council in December 2023.
Kan built a machine to calculate the complicated mahjong point system and applied for a patent in 1973.
Kan was portrayed by Shirō Sano in the 2020 film Fukushima 50, and by Fumiyo Kohinata in the 2023 Netflix series The Days
Kan was portrayed by Shirō Sano in the 2020 film Fukushima 50, and by Fumiyo Kohinata in the 2023 Netflix series The Days

The docu-drama The Seal of the Sun (2016, 90 min.), directed by Futoshi Sato, produced by Kaori Otsuka and executive produced by Tamiyoshi Tachibana, shows how the Prime Minister's office and the field struggled following the five days after the Fukushima nuclear accident.
